testcase.classname: Register User on automation practice online shopping portal
testcase.name: User create an account
Update Personal Information (first name) in My Account
testcase.system-out: Given I open browsername....................................................passed When I launch URL of Online Shopping portal.................................passed And I click on Sign_In_Link.................................................passed And I am taken inside sign-in page..........................................passed And I enter my registered email id..........................................passed And I enter my password.....................................................passed And I click on Sign_In_Submit_Btn...........................................passed Then I am taken inside the application......................................passed Given I am on online shopping My Account - My Store page....................passed When I click My Personal Information link...................................passed And I enter my changed first name...........................................passed And I enter my current password.............................................passed And I click on save_btn.....................................................passed Then The successful_personal_info_saved_message is displayed................passed And on top right corner, my change_fname can be verified....................passed
